objects.name: start_text
objects.string:
-- GameThingPrototype --

Survive the hordes of robots! Every ten seconds a switch activates a different group of enemies, stay sharp!

Move with WASD, hold the Mouse left button to aim and release it for shooting.

Press or shoot the Floor buttons to activate traps. You can even push unactive enemies onto them!

-- PRESS ANY KEY OR TOUCH(MOBILE) TO CONTINUE --

objects.name: gameover_text
objects.string:
-- GAME OVER --

Your score: 

Highest Score:

-- CLICK OR TOUCH TO RESTART --

events.comment: At the beginning of the game, hide unused layers, freeze game in background and display game info.
Set the activated variable to false for all hazards
Set the type variable of traps to their respective values

events.name: Change info texts depending on device

parameters:
"-- GAME OVER --" + NewLine() +
NewLine() +
"Your score: " + ToString(Variable(game_totalScore)) + NewLine() +
"Highest Score: " + ToString(GlobalVariable(game_highScore)) + NewLine() +
NewLine() +
"-- TOUCH TO RESTART --"

"-- GameThingPrototype --" + NewLine() 
+ NewLine() +
"Survive the hordes of robots! Every ten seconds a switch activates a different group of enemies, stay sharp!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"Move with the left touchpad, hold the right touchpad button to aim and release it for shooting." + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"Press or shoot the Floor buttons to activate traps. You can even push unactive enemies onto them!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"-- TOUCH TO CONTINUE --"

"-- GAME OVER --" + NewLine() +
NewLine() +
"Your score: " + ToString(Variable(game_totalScore)) + NewLine() +
"Highest Score: " + ToString(GlobalVariable(game_highScore)) + NewLine() +
NewLine() +
"-- PRESS R OR CLICK TO RESTART --"

"-- GameThingPrototype --" + NewLine() 
+ NewLine() +
"Survive the hordes of robots! Every ten seconds a switch activates a different group of enemies, stay sharp!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"Move with WASD, hold the Mouse left button to aim and release it for shooting." + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"Press or shoot the Floor buttons to activate traps. You can even push unactive enemies onto them!" + NewLine()
+ NewLine() +
"-- PRESS ANY KEY OR CLICK TO CONTINUE --"

events.comment: Restart game when r is pressed or a new touch is started to prevent accidentally starting the level again
Up to refactor for multiple inputs
Initialise changeState timer when game starts
Toggle active states when needed
UI Bar

events.name: Collision effects based on activated state

events.comment: Push inactive enemies
Trigger death when player in collision with an active hazard

events.name: Change animations based on activated state
Change use in pathfinding based on activated state

events.comment: Start and stop path obstacle behaviour of a trap depending on whether is it active or not
Start and stop path finding depending on whether an enemy is activated or not. Note that while the player is dead, that path finding of enemies stops
Trigger both traps when play is on trap button

Calculate Score by adding +1 for every Enemy hit, then multiply 100 by that number.
